name: LIVDSARSCoV2TestsResultsSpecimensCodes
title: LIVD SARS CoV2 Tests Results Specimens Codes
description: Using LOINC and SNOMED-CT to identify and report SARS-CoV-2 test results in electronic reporting systems will facilitate timely and quality data reporting to state and federal public health agencies. These codes are maintained by the CDC at https://www.cdc.gov/csels/dls/sars-cov-2-livd-codes.html
purpose: (Clinical Focus: EHR and other health IT to update systems to accommodate US SARS CoV-2 specimen collection, testing and results reporting.),(Data Element Scope: SARS CoV-2 test results and specimen value sets based on codes approved by CDC as part of the LIVD system (https://www.cdc.gov/csels/dls/sars-cov-2-livd-codes.html)),(Inclusion Criteria: Value sets containing codes for US approved SARS CoV-2 in vitro diagnostic tests, results, and specimen codes),(Exclusion Criteria: Codes associated with tests not approved in the US by the CDC and value sets not directly associated with the LIVD SARS CoV-2 code sets.)
